info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:17PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Luzerne County through 145 PM EDT... At 117 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Drums, or near Hazleton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hazleton, West Hazleton, Freeland, Conyngham, White Haven, Jeddo, Woodside-Drifton, Drifton, Drums and Mountain Top. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 near 262. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 145 and 151A and B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
